mapper.insert:
select SEQ_CLASSBOARD.nextval from dual
insert into CLASSBOARD(boNum,boTitle,boRegDate,boContent,memNum,boCode) values(#{boNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{boTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),#{boContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR},1,23)
mapper.select: SELECT A.BONUM,A.BOCODE,A.BOCONTENT,A.BOREGDATE,A.BOTITLE,A.BOVIEWS,A.BOURL,A.MEMNUM,A.BOTOPFIXED,B.FILECODE,b.filename,B.FILEPATH,b.memid FROM CLASSBOARD A,CLASSATTACHEDFILE B WHERE A.BONUM = B.BONUM AND A.BONUM=(SELECT BONUM FROM CLASSATTACHEDFILE WHERE BONUM=#{BONUM, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: delete from CLASSBOARD where boNum=#{boNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update CLASSBOARD set boTitle=#{boTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boContent=#{boContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, boUpdateDate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') where boNum=#{boNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from CLASSBOARD where boNum>0
